Over the past 9 years I have worked for and with some amazing people. All good runs come to an end and new opportunities will present themselves. Today was my last day at the Stratosphere and its hard to express in words how much those years meant to me. Soon it will time to write the next chapter.
Wanted:  a high-quality 1957 Thunderbird;  light resto-mod is ok.  Send photos and specs to me via email: muffy@muffybennett.com.
Please include the VIN,  how long ago it was restored,  undercarriage shots, asking price, and location.  Thank you, my darlings!  xo

American Senior Benefits has expanded to Arizona! I'm thrilled to be part of one of the nations fastest growing FMO's that recruits and hires hundreds of new agents every year, many of which are established professionals seeking a more rewarding career.Becoming a ASB agent is an ideal opportunity for individuals who want to build a financial business with significant income potential, help others achieve financial security, and maintain a flexible schedule. We offer tremendous guidance, encouragement, and training for those want to take this path to true ownership of their business.The opportunity: We are seeking talented people to join our team of professionals. Our team consists of individuals who are leaders in insurance, financial, estate, family and business planning, helping others plan for their future with a diverse portfolio and product line of more than 80 carriers. This wide variety of options generates a peace of mind, and leaves a lasting legacy for those we come in contact with. Together we will build a better future, as we put the people back in the people business.If you are interested in becoming a financial professional and want to learn more about joining our team of professionals contact me kweber@americanseniorbenefits.com

With national headquarters in Phoenix, Childhelp cherishes its work in the Grand Canyon State and honors the professionals and volunteers who take a stand against abuse and neglect here every day. Across Arizona, Childhelp is helping shape communities devoted to protecting children and strengthening families, and is proud to find so much support here for our mission. The Childhelp Children’s Center of Arizona, Childhelp Mobile Advocacy Center of Northern Arizona and the Childhelp Community Center provide much-needed services to Arizona families, as do the Childhelp National Child Abuse Hotline and Childhelp Speak Up Be Safe, which are both based in Childhelp’s Phoenix headquarters and serve children, families and communities nationwide.Chapters in Flagstaff and Phoenix join the families who serve through Childhelp Wings to support Childhelp’s mission, protect children, and build Arizona’s culture of compassionIn addition to many of the other Childhelp fundraising, events, and activities that are constantly taking place around the country, we are committed to host our very own fundraising event on an annual basis. Our first annual fundraiser will be called “25 men that think they can cook”! This will be so much fun with community leaders, as well as local celebrities and chefs all coming together for a night filled with great food, auction items, live entertainment and FUN! We have our location set for April 23rd of 2016 and are currently forming our committee members. This is something you won’t want to miss and will definitely want to be a part of! Get involved today, and contact us to learn more about our Chapter and join us for one of our Chapter meetings!

Mr. Weber began his career with Bankerslife as an agent, finishing his first year as #1 agent within the territory and #2 within the company of 1,100 recruits. In January of 2013 Mr. Weber was promoted to USV with the Denver South operations (a top 12 branch office in the company) and subsequently was promoted to BSM of Phoenix in November of 2013 to run the western Phoenix MSA, and western Arizona cities including, Yuma, Lake Havasu, Bullhead City and Kingman. Mr. Weber has achieved 92% growth in his first year as a BSM, finished #3 Rookie BSM within the company and has received over 15 recognition awards for his accomplishments regionally and nationally through his tenure.
Mr. Weber led a team of specialists centered around Life Insurance, Long Term Care, and financial advisors to assist with the branch operation and growth objectives.

KyVek Development is a private real estate firm that facilitated moderate and high yielding real estate investments located in Arizona and the Western United States.The firm was created as a vehicle for  high net-worth individuals, financial funds and trusts to take advantage of the opportunities of real estate investments with minimal risk while maintaining a solid yield on their money invested without the day to day management of their investments.  Due to the current market conditions the full equity investments are awaiting market stabilization.
I've been an active member with Childhelp for over 18 years! For the love of a Child!

recommendations: Bern Porter
Attorney at Porter Law Center Chartered
November 5, 2013, Bern worked with Kevin but at different companies

Kevin enjoys an excellent reputation among his fellow associates and brings fresh thinking to business opportunities.  He is a man with personal integrity, hard work ethic and visionary strategy.  He treats others with respect and honors his commitments.  He bites off more than he can chew, but finds ways to swallow his pride and develop sensible ways to accomplish seemingly impossible tasks.  He is a winner who keeps surpassing the finishing line he has set for himself.  He is loyal to all who have entrusted their challenges and opportunities to his capable management.

summary: As an accomplished executive with a diverse background spanning 20 years across of broad range of disciplines centered on the real estate and insurance industries within multiple MSA’s. I've been a decisive leader experienced in operations, P&L oversight, recruiting, marketing of multiple profit centers and service line organizations. A passionate, result orientated visionary, leading and motivating workforces, involving start-up and growth organizations. Identifying new market opportunity in changing environments through creative problem solving, while spearheading operational improvements to drive productivity reduce costs, increase profitability capturing additional market share. Creating additional market cap through value-add including developing strategic alliances to meet company objectives.Through all this experience over the years doing a variety things, none have been as rewarding as helping those in the baby boomers market segment deal with retirement concerns. I look forward to mentor and develop those who wish to work in the largest, fastest growing market segment for years to come.I look forward to many business partners at American Senior Benefits of Arizona! Learn more about joining our team!
